summary: Marcus Rivera (Marc) is a senior product designer at Lumen Labs in Austin, Texas, where he leads the design system team. He is passionate about accessibility and design tokens, regularly speaks at conferences, and runs a newsletter called 'Pixels & Purpose' focused on inclusive design. He also advises two early-stage startups and mentors junior designers.
